attributes.action: Arsene Wenger to stay at Arsenal until 2025
attributes.additional_details: Fans of all football clubs would like to see Arsene Wenger remain as manager of Arsenal until 2025, thus ensuring Arsenal do not win a trophy for at least another 12 years, and a neat total of 20 trophy less years. Please sign this petition if you would like to see this enshrined in law by the Minister of Sport.
